mapper.sql: id, getDiamondsQuan , totalScore , remark , getFruitsQuan , isValid , playerId , getCoinsQuan , getRevivesQuan , getBloodVialQuan , getPnvuQuan , createTime , getInvinciblePotionsQuan , getRewardsQuan
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO EndGameLog(getDiamondsQuan , totalScore , remark , getFruitsQuan , isValid , playerId , getCoinsQuan , getRevivesQuan , getBloodVialQuan , getPnvuQuan , createTime , getInvinciblePotionsQuan , getRewardsQuan) VALUE (#{entity.getDiamondsQuan} , #{entity.totalScore} , #{entity.remark} , #{entity.getFruitsQuan} ,
#{entity.isValid} 1
, #{entity.playerId} , #{entity.getCoinsQuan} , #{entity.getRevivesQuan} , #{entity.getBloodVialQuan} , #{entity.getPnvuQuan} ,
#{entity.createTime} now()
, #{entity.getInvinciblePotionsQuan} , #{entity.getRewardsQuan} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE EndGameLog
getDiamondsQuan = #{entity.getDiamondsQuan} ,
totalScore = #{entity.totalScore} ,
remark = #{entity.remark} ,
getFruitsQuan = #{entity.getFruitsQuan} ,
isValid = #{entity.isValid} ,
playerId = #{entity.playerId} ,
getCoinsQuan = #{entity.getCoinsQuan} ,
getRevivesQuan = #{entity.getRevivesQuan} ,
getBloodVialQuan = #{entity.getBloodVialQuan} ,
getPnvuQuan = #{entity.getPnvuQuan} ,
createTime = #{entity.createTime} ,
getInvinciblePotionsQuan = #{entity.getInvinciblePotionsQuan} ,
getRewardsQuan = #{entity.getRewardsQuan}
WHERE id = #{entity.id}
